When I read your comments I laughed alot. How can you be such an idiot... :D

Some nfo for you:
The name William "B.J." Blazkowicz appears in 1981 when the first wolfenstein game was released on C64 (castle wolfenstein).
The series gained popularity with Wolfenstein 3D (1992 which was developed by ID)

So the name does not come from ID nor activision (Game publishers dont give names to characters...) 

I think it has nothing to do with blowjob either. :D
